獪字的基本解释

獪
kuài
见“狯”。

獪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuài］
［《廣韻》古外切，去泰，見。］
［《廣韻》古邁切，去夬，見。］
亦作“1”。“狯1”的繁体字。
(1)狡猾；奸诈。
(2)指狡诈之人。

獪字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　獪； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页719第28
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】古外切【正韻】吉外切，?音澮。【說文】狡獪也。从犬，會聲。【揚子·方言】劋蹶，獪也。秦晉之閒曰獪。　又【廣韻】【正韻】古賣切【集韻】古邁切，?音夬。義同。【集韻】或作㹟狤。　又【博雅】擾也。　又【正韻】古壞切，音怪。本作㹟。狡也。　又【集韻】戸八切，音滑。本作猾。詳猾字註。狫字原从犭从?作。

考證：〔【集韻】或作㹟狫。〕　謹照原文㹟狫改㹟狤。

cunning
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kuài］
["Guangyun" ancient outside cut, go to Thailand, see you. ]
["Guangyun" Gu Maiqie, go to 夬, see you. ]
Also called "1". Traditional characters for "狯1".
(1) Cunning; treacherous.
(2) Refers to a cunning person.
cunning
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 2] [Dog Character Department] 　狯; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 719 28
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Ancient outer cut [Zheng Yun] Ji outer cut,? Yin Shu. [Said the text] Also cunning. From the dog, the meeting sound. 【Yangtze Dialect】劋蹶，狯也. The Qin and Jin dynasties said in a leisurely manner.　 [Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Ancient Selling Cut [Ji Yun] Ancient Mai Cut,? Yin Chu. The same meaning. [Ji Yun] Or as 㹟狤.　[Bo Ya] Interference also.　[Zheng Yun] The ancient and the bad, the sound is strange. This made 㹟. Cunning too.　[Ji Yun] Eight cuts, slippery sound. This is cunning. Detailed note of cunning words. The character 狫 was originally made from Shan Cong. Textual research: [[Jiyun] or Zuo 㹟狫. 〕　I would like to change 㹟狤 according to the original text.
